label: vanningEvent
comment: The vanning event (the loading of this consignment at the place of its original despatch) for this referenced supply chain consignment.
The vanning event for this supply chain consignment item, i.e. the loading of this consignment item at the place of original despatch.
The vanning event for this supply chain consignment, i.e. the loading of this consignment at the place of original despatch.

domainIncludes.comment: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.
An item within a consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.
